body:
Hello Avicus Network
I have a idea for some videos cinematic videos just now I uploaded a video here it's unlisted not to the Public but I want you guys to watch this and tell me:

Do You Like it?
Do you want to see more?
How Often?
What should I name these type of videos?

Video Link: https://youtu.be/VZmmBQxkRS0

All responses will be heard and appreciated :) can't wait to hear from all of you

Peace Out
shadowolf365
body_tagged:

shadowolf365
title: I have an idea?

replies.body:
Hi shadowolf365! I am pretty impressed about your video. This is my first post xD
This is just my opinion. It's your own choice to use my idea.

<Do You Like it>
I really like it. I felt like I'm watching a real official minecraft trailer :D
<Do you want to see more?>
I definitely want to watch and see more video about introducing Avicus Server! So that other's can watch this video and be able to enjoy more than before. 
<How Often?>
I was wondering about this question. My opinion that I thought of was once a month, or sometimes where new map release. However, the best idea I thought of was once if there's really big event. Not for only Avicus, but I recommend if you could upload more videos like this when it's Halloween, Christmas and etc. 
<What should I name these type of videos?>
Following the answer from above, depends on the events if you are going to use my idea. I would like to name it as "Welcome to Avicus" for the video you have linked above. If it's Halloween or Christmas, I recommend naming the videos like "Happy Avicus Halloween" or "Merry Avicus Christmas". 

This is only my Idea. Use your idea if you have some. Sorry if you didn't like my idea.

replies.body:
I'm pretty impressed about your first post xD

The video was pretty good, but you should do only 45 seconds for each map as it gets boring after a while.

replies.body: Yea it's a big long for one map, other than that I really like it, it's fun to watch xD
replies.body_tagged: Yea it's a big long for one map, other than that I really like it, it's fun to watch xD

replies.body:
Okay so I think I interpreted this incorrectly basically record one match on the map cinematically then from there music and the other stuff

@Shinny
I like the once a month idea, but I might go with 1 every week or 2 weeks because there is alot of maps to cover over all of Nebula.

@PokerFace and @DaFrozenBlaze
I know its too long I will probably only cut down to 5 minutes long enough for people to watch and enjoy the experience and the environment of the Avicus Network

replies.body: Happy that you liked my idea. :D Can't wait to see other videos
replies.body_tagged: Happy that you liked my idea. :D Can't wait to see other videos

replies.body: Since you are a media, why don't you make some cinematic shots of a tournament/league match? Possibly with shaders, it'll make it way more cooler :)
replies.body_tagged: Since you are a media, why don't you make some cinematic shots of a tournament/league match? Possibly with shaders, it'll make it way more cooler :)

replies.body: I already do when I am assigned onto tourney matches just not with shaders because my computer hates those
